message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a price of $1800000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1400000.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1400000 is a bit steep. Can we meet at $1100000?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $1300000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1300000 is still a bit too high for me. Can we meet at $1050000?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, but $1200000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but that's my final offer. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1175000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's the best price we can both agree on.
I've made it clear that I'm willing to pay $1050000, and I'm not going any higher. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
